info.name: SmartSusChef API
info.description:
# SmartSusChef Restaurant Management System API

## Overview
Complete API documentation for SmartSusChef restaurant management system.

## Authentication
All APIs require Bearer Token authentication except Register and Login endpoints.

## Getting Started
1. Call Register or Login to get a token
2. Token will be automatically saved to variables
3. Subsequent requests will automatically include the token

## Base URL
Default: `http://localhost:5000/api`
You can modify it in the Variables section.

item.name: Auth
item.description:
Authentication endpoints for user registration and login.

**Note**: Register and Login do not require authentication.

request.description:
## Register a New Manager Account

### Description
- Creates a new manager account
- Automatically creates an associated store
- Returns JWT Token for authentication

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| username | string | Yes | Username (must be unique, case-insensitive) |
| password | string | Yes | Password |
| name | string | Yes | Full name |
| email | string | Yes | Email address |

### Response
```json
{
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs...",
  "user": {
    "id": "guid",
    "username": "manager1",
    "name": "John Manager",
    "email": "manager@example.com",
    "role": "manager",
    "status": "Active"
  },
  "storeSetupRequired": true
}
```

### Notes
- After registration, call Store Setup to complete store information
- Username must be unique (checked case-insensitively)

## User Login

### Description
- Authenticates user credentials
- Returns JWT Token for subsequent API calls
- Supports both manager and employee login

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| username | string | Yes | Username |
| password | string | Yes | Password |

### Response
```json
{
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs...",
  "user": {
    "id": "guid",
    "username": "manager1",
    "name": "John Manager",
    "email": "manager@example.com",
    "role": "manager",
    "status": "Active"
  },
  "storeSetupRequired": false
}
```

### Error Codes
- 401: Invalid username or password
- 403: Account disabled

## Get Current User Information

### Description
- Retrieves the authenticated user's details
- Useful for token validation

### Response
```json
{
  "id": "guid",
  "username": "manager1",
  "name": "John Manager",
  "email": "manager@example.com",
  "role": "manager",
  "status": "Active"
}
```

### Error Codes
- 401: Invalid or expired token

## Check if Store Setup is Required

### Description
- Newly registered managers must complete store setup
- Frontend uses this to display setup wizard

### Response
```json
{
  "storeSetupRequired": true
}
```

### Use Cases
- Call after user login
- If true, prompt user to complete store setup

item.name: Users
item.description:
Employee account management endpoints.

**Permission**: Manager only

request.description:
## Get All Users in Store

### Description
- Returns all users in the current store (managers and employees)
- Ordered by creation date

### Permission
Manager only

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "id": "guid",
    "username": "staff1",
    "name": "Staff Member",
    "email": "staff@example.com",
    "role": "employee",
    "status": "Active",
    "createdAt": "2026-01-29T10:00:00Z"
  }
]
```

### Response Fields
| Field | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| role | manager or employee |
| status | Active or Inactive |

## Create New Employee Account

### Description
- Creates a new user in the current store
- Can create either employee or manager role

### Permission
Manager only

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| username | string | Yes | Username (globally unique) |
| password | string | Yes | Password |
| name | string | Yes | Full name |
| email | string | Yes | Email address |
| role | string | Yes | Employee or Manager |

### Error Codes
- 409: Username already exists

## Update User Information

### Description
- Updates user details
- Can reset password (leave empty to keep current)
- Can enable/disable account

### Permission
Manager only

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | User ID (GUID) |

### Request Parameters
All optional - only send fields to update
| Parameter | Type | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| username | string | New username |
| password | string | New password (leave empty to not change) |
| name | string | Full name |
| email | string | Email address |
| role | string | Role (Employee or Manager) |
| status | string | Active or Inactive |

### Error Codes
- 404: User not found
- 409: Username already taken

## Delete User Account

### Description
- Permanently deletes a user
- Cannot delete your own account

### Permission
Manager only

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | User ID (GUID) |

### Notes
- This action cannot be undone
- Recommend using Update to set status=Inactive instead

### Error Codes
- 400: Cannot delete own account
- 404: User not found

item.name: Store
item.description:
Store information and management endpoints.

Each manager account corresponds to one store with details like name, address, contact info.

## Initialize Store Information

### Description
- Newly registered users must complete store setup
- Can only be called once

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| companyName | string | Yes | Company name |
| uen | string | Yes | Business registration number |
| storeName | string | Yes | Store name |
| outletLocation | string | No | Outlet location/branch name |
| contactNumber | string | Yes | Contact phone number |
| address | string | Yes | Full address |
| latitude | number | Yes | Latitude (for weather/holidays) |
| longitude | number | Yes | Longitude |

### Singapore Common Coordinates
- Downtown: 1.3521, 103.8198
- Changi Airport: 1.3644, 103.9915
- Orchard Road: 1.3048, 103.8318

### Error Codes
- 400: Store already setup

## Update Store Information

### Description
Updates existing store information

### Permission
Manager only

### Request Parameters
All optional - only send fields to update

### Notes
Changing latitude/longitude will affect weather and holiday data retrieval

## Initialize Store with Sample Data

### Description
- Creates sample data for new store
- Includes sample ingredients and recipes
- For demonstration purposes only

### Notes
- Creates sample data
- Recommended for testing only

item.name: Ingredients
item.description:
Ingredient (food item) management endpoints.

Ingredients are the base unit of recipes, containing cost and carbon footprint information.

request.description:
## Get All Ingredients

### Description
Retrieve all ingredients in the current store

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "id": "guid",
    "name": "Chicken Breast",
    "unit": "g",
    "carbonFootprint": 0.0069,
    "supplierUnit": "1kg",
    "supplierUnitCost": 12.50,
    "totalUnitsInPackage": 1000
  }
]
```

### Response Fields
| Field | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| unit | Base measurement unit (g/ml/pcs) |
| carbonFootprint | CO2 emissions per unit (kg CO2) |
| supplierUnit | Supplier package unit |
| supplierUnitCost | Supplier unit price (S$) |
| totalUnitsInPackage | Base units per package |

## Get Single Ingredient Details

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Ingredient ID (GUID) |

### Error Codes
- 404: Ingredient not found

## Create New Ingredient

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | string | Yes | Ingredient name |
| unit | string | Yes | Base unit (g/ml/pcs) |
| carbonFootprint | number | No | CO2 emissions per unit (kg) |
| supplierUnit | string | No | Supplier package (e.g., "1kg") |
| supplierUnitCost | number | No | Supplier unit price (S$) |
| totalUnitsInPackage | number | No | Base units per package |

### Example: Chicken Breast
- Supplier sells 1kg packages at S$12.50
- Base unit: grams (g)
- Package contains: 1000g
- Unit cost: S$12.50/1000 = S$0.0125/g

### Carbon Footprint Reference
| Ingredient | kg CO2/kg |
|-----------|----------|
| Beef | 27.0 |
| Pork | 12.1 |
| Chicken | 6.9 |
| Rice | 2.7 |
| Vegetables | 2.0 |

## Update Ingredient Information

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Ingredient ID (GUID) |

### Request Parameters
Same as Create, all fields optional

### Error Codes
- 404: Ingredient not found

## Delete Ingredient

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Ingredient ID (GUID) |

### Notes
- If ingredient is referenced by recipes, deletion may fail
- Check recipe usage before deleting

### Error Codes
- 404: Ingredient not found
- 409: Ingredient is referenced by recipes

item.name: Recipes
item.description:
Recipe management endpoints.

Two recipe types:
- **Main Recipe** (isSubRecipe=false): Sellable menu items
- **Sub-Recipe** (isSubRecipe=true): Semi-finished ingredients (sauces, stocks)

request.description:
## Get All Recipes

### Description
Retrieve all recipes in the current store (main and sub-recipes)

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "id": "guid",
    "name": "Chicken Rice",
    "isSellable": true,
    "isSubRecipe": false,
    "ingredients": [
      {
        "ingredientId": "guid",
        "childRecipeId": null,
        "displayName": "Chicken Breast",
        "unit": "g",
        "quantity": 200
      }
    ]
  }
]
```

### Response Fields
| Field | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| isSubRecipe | true=sub-recipe, false=main recipe |
| isSellable | Can be sold independently |
| ingredientId | Present when referencing ingredient |
| childRecipeId | Present when referencing sub-recipe |

## Get Single Recipe Details

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Recipe ID (GUID) |

### Error Codes
- 404: Recipe not found

## Create Main Recipe (Sellable Dish)

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| name | string | Yes | Recipe name |
| isSellable | boolean | Yes | true for main recipes |
| isSubRecipe | boolean | Yes | false for main recipes |
| ingredients | array | Yes | List of ingredients |

### Ingredient Object
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| ingredientId | string | Conditional | Ingredient ID (or childRecipeId) |
| childRecipeId | string | Conditional | Sub-recipe ID (or ingredientId) |
| quantity | number | Yes | Quantity needed |

### Example: Chicken Rice
- Chicken Breast: 200g
- Rice: 150g

## Create Sub-Recipe (Semi-Finished Ingredient)

### Description
Sub-recipes are semi-finished ingredients that can be referenced by other recipes, such as:
- Sauces
- Stocks
- Marinades

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Value |
|-----------|-------|
| isSellable | false (not sold separately) |
| isSubRecipe | true |

### Use Case
1. Create sub-recipe "Special Sauce"
2. Reference it in main recipes
3. System automatically calculates ingredient quantities

## Create Recipe with Sub-Recipe Reference

### Description
Main recipe ingredients can be either:
- Regular ingredients (ingredientId)
- Sub-recipes (childRecipeId)

### Example: Chicken Rice with Special Sauce
- Chicken Breast: 200g (ingredient)
- Rice: 150g (ingredient)
- Special Sauce: 30ml (sub-recipe)

### Notes
- Only one of ingredientId or childRecipeId per item
- Sub-recipe must exist before referencing

## Update Recipe

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Recipe ID (GUID) |

### Request Parameters
Same as Create endpoint

### Notes
- Replaces all ingredients - send complete list
- Can convert main recipe to sub-recipe

### Error Codes
- 404: Recipe not found

## Delete Recipe

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Recipe ID (GUID) |

### Notes
- Sub-recipes referenced by other recipes may not delete
- Related sales data remains intact

### Error Codes
- 404: Recipe not found
- 409: Recipe is referenced by other recipes

item.name: Sales
item.description:
Sales data management endpoints.

Records daily sales quantities per dish, used for trend analysis and forecasting.

request.description:
## Get Sales Data List

### Query Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| startDate | string | No | Start date (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| endDate | string | No | End date (YYYY-MM-DD) |

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "id": "guid",
    "date": "2026-01-29",
    "recipeId": "guid",
    "recipeName": "Chicken Rice",
    "quantity": 50
  }
]
```

### Notes
- Omit dates to get all data
- Results ordered by date descending

## Get Single Sales Record

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Sales record ID (GUID) |

### Error Codes
- 404: Record not found

## Get Sales Trend Data

### Description
Aggregates sales by date for charting

### Query Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| startDate | string | Yes | Start date |
| endDate | string | Yes | End date |

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "date": "2026-01-29",
    "totalQuantity": 150,
    "recipeBreakdown": [
      {
        "recipeId": "guid",
        "recipeName": "Chicken Rice",
        "quantity": 80
      }
    ]
  }
]
```

### Use Cases
- Sales trend charts
- Daily sales comparison

## Get Ingredient Usage for Date

### Description
Calculates ingredient quantities used based on daily sales

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| date | Date (YYYY-MM-DD) |

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "ingredientId": "guid",
    "ingredientName": "Chicken Breast",
    "quantity": 10000
  }
]
```

### Calculation
Ingredient usage = Σ(recipe sales × ingredient quantity in recipe)

### Use Cases
- Ingredient consumption tracking
- Inventory planning

## Get Recipe Sales for Date

### Description
Gets all recipe sales quantities for a specific day

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| date | Date (YYYY-MM-DD) |

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "recipeId": "guid",
    "recipeName": "Chicken Rice",
    "quantity": 50
  }
]
```

## Record Sales Data

### Description
Records a recipe's daily sales quantity

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| date | string | Yes | Date (YYYY-MM-DD) |
| recipeId | string | Yes | Recipe ID (GUID) |
| quantity | number | Yes | Sales quantity |

### Notes
- Multiple records per recipe per day allowed
- Employees and managers can record sales

## Bulk Import Sales Data

### Description
Imports multiple sales records from CSV or POS system

### Request Parameters
```json
{
  "salesData": [
    {
      "date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
      "recipeId": "GUID",
      "quantity": number
    }
  ]
}
```

### Use Cases
- Import from POS system
- Bulk upload historical data

### Notes
- Recommend batch size: max 1000 records
- Failed records skipped without affecting others

## Update Sales Data

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Sales record ID (GUID) |

### Request Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| date | string | Yes | Date |
| recipeId | string | Yes | Recipe ID |
| quantity | number | Yes | Sales quantity |

### Notes
- Must include all fields

### Error Codes
- 404: Record not found

## Delete Sales Data

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| id | Sales record ID (GUID) |

### Error Codes
- 404: Record not found

item.name: Forecast
item.description:
Sales forecasting and calendar data endpoints.

Provides sales predictions, weather data, holidays, and calendar views.

request.description:
## Get Sales Forecast Data

### Description
Predicts future sales based on historical data

### Query Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| startDate | string | Yes | Start date |
| endDate | string | Yes | End date |

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "date": "2026-01-30",
    "recipeId": "guid",
    "recipeName": "Chicken Rice",
    "predictedQuantity": 55,
    "confidence": 0.85
  }
]
```

### Prediction Factors
- Historical sales trends
- Day of week
- Holidays
- Weather

## Get Current Weather Data

### Description
Retrieves current weather for store location

### Response
```json
{
  "temperature": 30.5,
  "feelsLike": 35.2,
  "humidity": 75,
  "description": "Partly Cloudy",
  "icon": "02d"
}
```

### Data Source
OpenWeatherMap API using store latitude/longitude

### Weather Icons
| Icon | Meaning |
|------|----------|
| 01d/01n | Clear |
| 02d/02n | Few Clouds |
| 03d/03n | Scattered Clouds |
| 04d/04n | Broken Clouds |
| 09d/09n | Shower Rain |
| 10d/10n | Rain |
| 11d/11n | Thunderstorm |
| 13d/13n | Snow |
| 50d/50n | Mist |

query.description: Country code (optional, auto-detected from store location)

request.description:
## Get Public Holidays

### Description
Retrieves public holidays for a year

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| year | Year (e.g., 2026) |

### Query Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| countryCode | Country code (optional, e.g., SG/MY/CN) |

### Response
```json
[
  {
    "date": "2026-01-01",
    "name": "New Year's Day",
    "type": "public"
  },
  {
    "date": "2026-02-17",
    "name": "Chinese New Year",
    "type": "public"
  }
]
```

### Data Source
Nager.Date API

### Supported Country Codes
- SG: Singapore
- MY: Malaysia
- CN: China
- US: United States
- etc.

## Get Tomorrow's Sales Forecast

### Description
Quick endpoint for tomorrow's forecast

### Response
Includes predicted quantities and required ingredients for tomorrow

### Use Cases
- Dashboard display
- Inventory reminder

## Get Single Day Calendar Data

### Description
Retrieves comprehensive daily information including:
- Sales data (historical)
- Forecast data (future)
- Holiday info
- Weather

### URL Parameters
| Parameter | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| date | Date (YYYY-MM-DD) |

### Response
```json
{
  "date": "2026-01-29",
  "dayOfWeek": "Wednesday",
  "isHoliday": false,
  "holidayName": null,
  "weather": {
    "temperature": 30,
    "description": "Sunny"
  },
  "sales": {
    "totalQuantity": 150,
    "recipes": [...]
  },
  "forecast": {
    "totalQuantity": 160,
    "recipes": [...]
  }
}
```

## Get Calendar Data for Date Range

### Description
Retrieves daily calendar data for a period

### Query Parameters
| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| startDate | string | Yes | Start date |
| endDate | string | Yes | End date |

### Response
Array of calendar data for each day in range

### Use Cases
- Calendar view display
- Monthly reporting
